abstract: BP said that the collapse of an agreement to sell its majority stake in Pan American Energy to its partner in the venture should have little significant effect on its financial health.
snippet: BP said that the collapse of an agreement to sell its majority stake in Pan American Energy to its partner in the venture should have little significant effect on its financial health.
lead_paragraph: BP’s plan to sell its majority stake in the Argentine oil producer Pan American Energy for $7.1 billion collapsed on Sunday after the would-be buyer, the Bridas Corporation, backed out.

headline.main: BP’s Sale of Pan American Energy Stake Falls Apart

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
